mapper.delete:
delete from proposal_fhhz where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(id) from proposal_fhhz where createId = #{createid} and taxxid=#{taxxid}
select count(id) from proposal_fhhz p1 left join sys_user s1 on p1.createId = s1.user_id where s1.username = #{name} and p1.taxxid = #{taxxid} and p1.type=2
